text: Anɨb ak, based Eblaham ne tɨkek tɨk dad amɨl apɨl gɨl nɨm, bɨnonɨm Depid nop wajɨlem pɨs ak tɨkɨlak. Tɨkel, Depid ne pen tɨkek tɨk dad amɨl apɨl gɨl nɨm, Babilon bɨ okok apɨl kɨlop nag lɨl dad man kɨli ak amnɨlak ñɨn ak, abe wajɨlem pɨs ak tɨkɨlak. Pen nag lɨl dad amelak, kɨdek pen tepayaŋ tɨkek tɨk dad amɨl apɨl gɨl nɨm, Klays nop wajɨlem pɨs ak tɨkɨlak.
